BP_ItemDescriptorPortableMiner_C.name: Portable Miner
BP_ItemDescriptorPortableMiner_C.description:
Automatically extracts a resource when placed on a resource node.
Note: Has limited storage space.

Desc_AlienDNACapsule_C.name: Alien DNA Capsule
Desc_AlienDNACapsule_C.description:
Translates organic chemicals into readable alien genetic information.
Used for researching alien organisms.

Go the extra kilometer! Knowledge is power, and power is just efficiency with fewer steps. Depositing Alien DNA Capsules in the AWESOME Sink provides FICSIT with knowledge, and pioneers with Coupons.

Desc_AlienPowerFuel_C.name: Alien Power Matrix
Desc_AlienPowerFuel_C.description: This intricate condensed-matter matrix is used to enhance the output of the Alien Power Augmenter.

Desc_AlienProtein_C.name: Alien Protein
Desc_AlienProtein_C.description:
Ground-up Alien Remains in a neat little package.
Used for medical purposes and to research alien organisms.

Desc_AluminaSolution_C.name: Alumina Solution
Desc_AluminaSolution_C.description: Dissolved Alumina, extracted from Bauxite. Can be further refined into Aluminum Scrap for Aluminum Ingot production.

Desc_AluminumCasing_C.name: Aluminum Casing
Desc_AluminumCasing_C.description: A versatile container cast from Aluminum Ingots.

Desc_AluminumIngot_C.name: Aluminum Ingot
Desc_AluminumIngot_C.description:
Smelted from Aluminum Scrap, which is refined from Alumina Solution.
Used to produce specialized aluminum-based parts.

Desc_AluminumPlate_C.name: Alclad Aluminum Sheet
Desc_AluminumPlate_C.description: Used to make products that require high heat conduction or a high specific strength. Thin, lightweight, and highly durable.

Desc_AluminumScrap_C.name: Aluminum Scrap
Desc_AluminumScrap_C.description: Refined from Alumina. Can be smelted into Aluminum Ingots for industrial usage.

Desc_Battery_C.name: Battery
Desc_Battery_C.description: Primarily used as fuel for Drones and vehicles.

Desc_Biofuel_C.name: Solid Biofuel
Desc_Biofuel_C.description: The most energy-efficient form of solid Biomass. Can be used as fuel for the Chainsaw.

Desc_Cable_C.name: Cable
Desc_Cable_C.description:
Used for crafting.
Primarily used to build Power Lines.

Desc_CartridgeChaos_C.name: Turbo Rifle Ammo
Desc_CartridgeChaos_C.description: Lightweight, compact, and volatile. These rounds provide extreme capacity and rate of fire at the cost of accuracy.

Desc_CartridgeSmartProjectile_C.name: Homing Rifle Ammo
Desc_CartridgeSmartProjectile_C.description:
The bullet guidance system built into this ammunition allows it to accurately hit any target within the reticle area.
Especially useful when dealing with agile threats, or for pioneers who can't be bothered to aim properly.

Desc_CartridgeStandard_C.name: Rifle Ammo
Desc_CartridgeStandard_C.description: Standard issue Rifle ammunition, useful for establishing dominance.

Desc_Cement_C.name: Concrete
Desc_Cement_C.description:
Used for building.
Good for stable Foundations.

Desc_CircuitBoardHighSpeed_C.name: AI Limiter
Desc_CircuitBoardHighSpeed_C.description: Controls AIs and keeps them from evolving in malicious ways. Super advanced electronics.

Desc_CircuitBoard_C.name: Circuit Board
Desc_CircuitBoard_C.description: Advanced electronics that have a plethora of different uses.

Desc_Coal_C.name: Coal
Desc_Coal_C.description: Mainly used as fuel for vehicles & Coal-Powered Generators, or in Steel production.

Desc_CompactedCoal_C.name: Compacted Coal
Desc_CompactedCoal_C.description: A much more efficient alternative to Coal. Used as fuel for vehicles and Coal-Powered Generators.

Desc_ComputerSuper_C.name: Supercomputer
Desc_ComputerSuper_C.description: The next-gen version of a Computer.

Desc_Computer_C.name: Computer
Desc_Computer_C.description: A complex logic machine that is used to control advanced behavior in other machines.

Desc_CoolingSystem_C.name: Cooling System
Desc_CoolingSystem_C.description: Keeps advanced parts and buildings from exceeding efficient temperature levels.

Desc_CopperDust_C.name: Copper Powder
Desc_CopperDust_C.description:
Ground-up Copper Ingots.
The high natural density of Copper, combined with the granularity of the powder, makes this part perfect for producing Nuclear Pasta in the Particle Accelerator.

Desc_CopperIngot_C.name: Copper Ingot
Desc_CopperIngot_C.description: Used for crafting the most basic parts.

Desc_CopperSheet_C.name: Copper Sheet
Desc_CopperSheet_C.description:
Used for crafting.
Primarily used for Pipelines due to its high corrosion resistance.

Desc_CrystalOscillator_C.name: Crystal Oscillator
Desc_CrystalOscillator_C.description: An electronic oscillator circuit that uses the mechanical resonance of a vibrating crystal to create an electrical signal with a precise frequency.

Desc_CrystalShard_C.name: Power Shard
Desc_CrystalShard_C.description:
Power Slug mucus compressed into a solid crystal-like shard. 
It radiates a strange power.

Desc_Crystal_C.name: Blue Power Slug
Desc_Crystal_C.description: A strange slug radiating an unknown weak power.

Desc_Crystal_mk2_C.name: Yellow Power Slug
Desc_Crystal_mk2_C.description: A strange slug radiating an unknown power.

Desc_Crystal_mk3_C.name: Purple Power Slug
Desc_Crystal_mk3_C.description: A strange slug radiating a powerful unknown power.

Desc_DarkEnergy_C.name: Dark Matter Residue
Desc_DarkEnergy_C.description:
Produced as a by-product of Quantum Encoding processes and alternatively generated in the Converter.

Various fields of science are still debating the nature and properties of Dark Matter. Meanwhile, FICSIT has found several applications for it in space-time manipulation.

Desc_DarkMatter_C.name: Dark Matter Crystal
Desc_DarkMatter_C.description:
Concentrated Dark Matter Residue that is isolated within a crystalline vessel. This form of containment allows for utilising Dark Matter reliably in other production processes.

Power Usage: 500-1500 MW (1000 MW average).

Desc_Diamond_C.name: Diamonds
Desc_Diamond_C.description:
Synthetic Diamonds produced by exposing Coal to extreme heat and pressure.

Used in the production of Time Crystals and Dark Matter Crystals.

Power Usage: 250-750 MW (500 MW average).

Desc_DissolvedSilica_C.name: Dissolved Silica
Desc_DissolvedSilica_C.description:
Silica dissolved in Water, produced as part of the alternative refinement of Raw Quartz.
The Silica can be extracted from the Water to complete the refinement process.

Desc_Fabric_C.name: Fabric
Desc_Fabric_C.description:
Used to craft equipment.
Flexible but durable fabric.

Desc_FicsiteIngot_C.name: Ficsite Ingot
Desc_FicsiteIngot_C.description:
Produced by reconstructing other metals on a molecular level using Strange Alien Matter.

Synthesized by FICSIT to be the perfect construction material, and used in the most high-end processes.

Desc_FicsiteMesh_C.name: Ficsite Trigon
Desc_FicsiteMesh_C.description: The Ficsite Trigon, made from Ficsite Ingots, is perfectly shaped for all construction challenges. It's performance is so exceptional, it basically solved structural engineering.

Desc_FicsoniumFuelRod_C.name: Ficsonium Fuel Rod
Desc_FicsoniumFuelRod_C.description:
Used as fuel for Nuclear Power Plants.
The power source that put FICSIT on the map. Literally. The crater is still there.

Caution: Moderately Radioactive.

Desc_Ficsonium_C.name: Ficsonium
Desc_Ficsonium_C.description:
Usage and production of this material is strictly prohibited. On Earth, that is. There are no rules in space, only efficiency. 

Power Usage: 500-1500 MW (1000 MW average).

Desc_Filter_C.name: Gas Filter
Desc_Filter_C.description: Filters out toxins and pollutants from the air when used with a Gas Mask.

Desc_FluidCanister_C.name: Empty Canister
Desc_FluidCanister_C.description: Used to package fluids for transportation.

Desc_Fuel_C.name: Packaged Fuel
Desc_Fuel_C.description: Fuel, packaged for alternative transport. Can be used as fuel for vehicles and the Jetpack.

Desc_GasTank_C.name: Empty Fluid Tank
Desc_GasTank_C.description: Used to package gases and volatile liquids for transportation.

Desc_GenericBiomass_C.name: Biomass
Desc_GenericBiomass_C.description:
Primarily used as fuel.
Biomass Burners and vehicles can use it for power.
Biomass is much more energy-efficient than raw biological matter.

Desc_GoldIngot_C.name: Caterium Ingot
Desc_GoldIngot_C.description: Smelted from Caterium Ore. Primarily used for advanced electronics.

Desc_GunpowderMK2_C.name: Smokeless Powder
Desc_GunpowderMK2_C.description: An explosive powder that is commonly used to produce modern firearms.

Desc_Gunpowder_C.name: Black Powder
Desc_Gunpowder_C.description: An explosive powder that is commonly used to produce simple explosives.

Desc_HatcherParts_C.name: Hatcher Remains
Desc_HatcherParts_C.description:
The shell-like remains of an alien... thing.
Used for MAM research.

Desc_HazmatFilter_C.name: Iodine-Infused Filter
Desc_HazmatFilter_C.description: Absorbs radioactive particles when used with the Hazmat Suit.

Desc_HeavyOilResidue_C.name: Heavy Oil Residue
Desc_HeavyOilResidue_C.description: A by-product of Plastic and Rubber production. Can be further refined into Fuel and Petroleum Coke.

Desc_HighSpeedConnector_C.name: High-Speed Connector
Desc_HighSpeedConnector_C.description: Connects multiple cables and wires in a very efficient way. Uses a standard pattern, so it has many varied applications.

Desc_HighSpeedWire_C.name: Quickwire
Desc_HighSpeedWire_C.description: Caterium's high conductivity and resistance to corrosion make it ideal for small, advanced electronics.

Desc_HogParts_C.name: Hog Remains
Desc_HogParts_C.description:
The carapace of an alien Hog creature.
Used for MAM research.

Desc_IonizedFuel_C.name: Ionized Fuel
Desc_IonizedFuel_C.description:
Fuel that has been ionized, allowing it to deliver incredible output.
Can be used as-is to power Fuel-Powered Generators, or packaged to be used as fuel for vehicles or the Jetpack.

Desc_IronIngot_C.name: Iron Ingot
Desc_IronIngot_C.description: Used for crafting the most basic parts.

Desc_IronPlateReinforced_C.name: Reinforced Iron Plate
Desc_IronPlateReinforced_C.description:
Used for crafting.
A sturdier and more durable Iron Plate.

Desc_IronPlate_C.name: Iron Plate
Desc_IronPlate_C.description:
Used for crafting.
One of the most basic parts.

Desc_IronRod_C.name: Iron Rod
Desc_IronRod_C.description:
Used for crafting.
One of the most basic parts.

Desc_IronScrew_C.name: Screw
Desc_IronScrew_C.description:
Used for crafting.
One of the most basic parts.

Desc_Leaves_C.name: Leaves
Desc_Leaves_C.description:
Primarily used as fuel.
Biomass Burners and vehicles can use Leaves for power.

Desc_LiquidBiofuel_C.name: Liquid Biofuel
Desc_LiquidBiofuel_C.description: Liquid Biofuel can be used as-is to generate power, or packaged to be used as fuel for vehicles.

Desc_LiquidFuel_C.name: Fuel
Desc_LiquidFuel_C.description: Can be used as-is to generate power, or packaged to be used as fuel for vehicles or the Jetpack.

Desc_LiquidOil_C.name: Crude Oil
Desc_LiquidOil_C.description: Refined into all kinds of Oil-based resources, like Fuel and Plastic.

Desc_LiquidTurboFuel_C.name: Turbofuel
Desc_LiquidTurboFuel_C.description: A more efficient alternative to Fuel. Can be used as-is to generate power, or packaged to be used as fuel for vehicles.

Desc_ModularFrameFused_C.name: Fused Modular Frame
Desc_ModularFrameFused_C.description: A corrosion-resistant, nitride-hardened, highly-robust-yet-lightweight modular frame.

Desc_ModularFrame_C.name: Modular Frame
Desc_ModularFrame_C.description:
Used for crafting.
A multipurpose building block.

Desc_MotorLightweight_C.name: Turbo Motor
Desc_MotorLightweight_C.description: A more complex and powerful version of the regular Motor.

Desc_Motor_C.name: Motor
Desc_Motor_C.description: Creates a mechanical force that is used to move things from machines to vehicles.

Desc_Mycelia_C.name: Mycelia
Desc_Mycelia_C.description:
Used for crafting.
Biomass Burners and vehicles can also use Mycelia for power.

Desc_NitricAcid_C.name: Nitric Acid
Desc_NitricAcid_C.description: Produced when Nitrogen Gas reacts with Water. Its high corrosiveness and oxidizing properties make it an excellent choice for refinement and fuel production processes.

Desc_NitrogenGas_C.name: Nitrogen Gas
Desc_NitrogenGas_C.description: Has a variety of uses, including metallurgy, cooling, and Nitric Acid production. On MASSAGE-2 (AB)b, it can be extracted from underground gas wells.

Desc_NobeliskCluster_C.name: Cluster Nobelisk
Desc_NobeliskCluster_C.description: Detonates into multiple smaller explosions. Practical for clearing out large areas of vegetation and other inconveniences.

Desc_NobeliskExplosive_C.name: Nobelisk
Desc_NobeliskExplosive_C.description: A simple explosive, useful for clearing boulders, vegetation, and other obstacles.

Desc_NobeliskGas_C.name: Gas Nobelisk
Desc_NobeliskGas_C.description: Creates a deadly gas cloud instead of a regular explosion.

Desc_NobeliskNuke_C.name: Nuke Nobelisk
Desc_NobeliskNuke_C.description:
Uses a nuclear fission reaction to generate a massive explosion.
WARNING: Ensure all FICSIT property is clear of the blast zone before detonation.

Desc_NobeliskShockwave_C.name: Pulse Nobelisk
Desc_NobeliskShockwave_C.description: Generates a powerful shockwave instead of a regular explosion.

Desc_NonFissibleUranium_C.name: Non-Fissile Uranium
Desc_NonFissibleUranium_C.description:
The Uranium-238 isotope is non-fissile, meaning it cannot be used for nuclear fission. It can, however, be converted into fissile Plutonium in the Particle Accelerator.

Caution: Mildly Radioactive.

Desc_NuclearFuelRod_C.name: Uranium Fuel Rod
Desc_NuclearFuelRod_C.description:
Used as fuel for Nuclear Power Plants.

Caution: Produces radioactive Uranium Waste when consumed.
Caution: Moderately Radioactive.

Desc_NuclearWaste_C.name: Uranium Waste
Desc_NuclearWaste_C.description:
The by-product of consuming Uranium Fuel Rods in a Nuclear Power Plant.
Non-Fissile Uranium can be extracted. Handle with caution.

Caution: HIGHLY Radioactive.

Desc_OreBauxite_C.name: Bauxite
Desc_OreBauxite_C.description: Used to produce Alumina, which can be further refined into the Aluminum Scrap required to produce Aluminum Ingots.

Desc_OreCopper_C.name: Copper Ore
Desc_OreCopper_C.description:
Used for crafting.
A basic resource primarily used for electricity.

Desc_OreGold_C.name: Caterium Ore
Desc_OreGold_C.description: Smelted into Caterium Ingots, which are primarily used for advanced electronics.

Desc_OreIron_C.name: Iron Ore
Desc_OreIron_C.description:
Used for crafting.
The most essential basic resource.

Desc_OreUranium_C.name: Uranium
Desc_OreUranium_C.description:
A radioactive element. 
Used to produce Encased Uranium Cells for Uranium Fuel Rods.

Caution: Moderately Radioactive.

Desc_PackagedAlumina_C.name: Packaged Alumina Solution
Desc_PackagedAlumina_C.description: Alumina Solution, packaged for alternative transport.

Desc_PackagedBiofuel_C.name: Packaged Liquid Biofuel
Desc_PackagedBiofuel_C.description: Liquid Biofuel, packaged for alternative transport. Can be used as fuel for vehicles and the Jetpack.

Desc_PackagedIonizedFuel_C.name: Packaged Ionized Fuel
Desc_PackagedIonizedFuel_C.description: Ionized Fuel, packaged for alternative transport. Can be used as fuel for vehicles and the Jetpack.

Desc_PackagedNitricAcid_C.name: Packaged Nitric Acid
Desc_PackagedNitricAcid_C.description: Nitric Acid, packaged for alternative transport.

Desc_PackagedNitrogenGas_C.name: Packaged Nitrogen Gas
Desc_PackagedNitrogenGas_C.description: Nitrogen Gas, packaged for alternative transport.

Desc_PackagedOilResidue_C.name: Packaged Heavy Oil Residue
Desc_PackagedOilResidue_C.description: Heavy Oil Residue, packaged for alternative transport. Can be used as fuel for vehicles.

Desc_PackagedOil_C.name: Packaged Oil
Desc_PackagedOil_C.description: Crude Oil, packaged for alternative transport. Can be used as fuel for vehicles.

Desc_PackagedRocketFuel_C.name: Packaged Rocket Fuel
Desc_PackagedRocketFuel_C.description: Rocket Fuel, packaged for alternative transport. Can be used as fuel for vehicles and the Jetpack.

Desc_PackagedSulfuricAcid_C.name: Packaged Sulfuric Acid
Desc_PackagedSulfuricAcid_C.description: Sulfuric Acid, packaged for alternative transport.

Desc_PetroleumCoke_C.name: Petroleum Coke
Desc_PetroleumCoke_C.description:
Used for crafting.
A carbon-rich material distilled from Heavy Oil Residue. 
Used as a less efficient Coal replacement.

Desc_Plastic_C.name: Plastic
Desc_Plastic_C.description: Versatile and easy to manufacture, this material has a wide range of uses.

Desc_PlutoniumCell_C.name: Encased Plutonium Cell
Desc_PlutoniumCell_C.description:
Plutonium Pellets encased in concrete.
Used to produce Plutonium Fuel Rods for Nuclear Power production.

Caution: Moderately Radioactive.

Desc_PlutoniumFuelRod_C.name: Plutonium Fuel Rod
Desc_PlutoniumFuelRod_C.description:
Used as fuel for Nuclear Power Plants.

Caution: Produces radioactive Plutonium Waste when consumed.
Caution: HIGHLY Radioactive.

Desc_PlutoniumPellet_C.name: Plutonium Pellet
Desc_PlutoniumPellet_C.description:
Produced in the Particle Accelerator through conversion of Non-fissile Uranium.
Used to produce Encased Plutonium Cells for Plutonium Fuel Rods.

Power Usage: 250-750 MW (500 MW average).
Caution: Moderately Radioactive.

Desc_PlutoniumWaste_C.name: Plutonium Waste
Desc_PlutoniumWaste_C.description:
The by-product of consuming Plutonium Fuel Rods in a Nuclear Power Plant.
Must be stored in a safe location. Handle with caution.

Caution: EXTREMELY Radioactive.

Desc_PolymerResin_C.name: Polymer Resin
Desc_PolymerResin_C.description: A by-product of Crude Oil refinement into Fuel. Commonly used to manufacture Plastic and Rubber.

Desc_PressureConversionCube_C.name: Pressure Conversion Cube
Desc_PressureConversionCube_C.description: Converts outgoing force into internal pressure. Required to contain unstable, high-energy matter.

Desc_QuantumEnergy_C.name: Excited Photonic Matter
Desc_QuantumEnergy_C.description:
Excited Photonic Matter is essential for all production processes in the Quantum Encoder.

Formed in the Converter by inducing intense photon interactions through exposure to SAM in a high-energy environment.

Desc_QuantumOscillator_C.name: Superposition Oscillator
Desc_QuantumOscillator_C.description: An oscillator circuit that uses the mechanical resonance of a vibrating crystal to create a string vibration with a precise frequency. Often used in teleportation technology and dimensional manipulation.

Desc_QuartzCrystal_C.name: Quartz Crystal
Desc_QuartzCrystal_C.description: Derived from Raw Quartz. Used in the production of advanced radar technology and high-quality display screens.

Desc_RawQuartz_C.name: Raw Quartz
Desc_RawQuartz_C.description: Can be processed into Quartz Crystals and Silica, which both offer a variety of applications.

Desc_Rebar_Explosive_C.name: Explosive Rebar
Desc_Rebar_Explosive_C.description: Explodes on impact, dealing heavy damage.

Desc_Rebar_Spreadshot_C.name: Shatter Rebar
Desc_Rebar_Spreadshot_C.description: Fractures when shot, launching deadly debris with wide spread but limited range.

Desc_Rebar_Stunshot_C.name: Stun Rebar
Desc_Rebar_Stunshot_C.description:
Electrocutes the target on impact, stunning it for a short time.

Stun Duration: 5 seconds

Desc_RocketFuel_C.name: Rocket Fuel
Desc_RocketFuel_C.description:
A high-impulse compressed gas fuel.
Can be used as-is to power Fuel-Powered Generators, or packaged to be used as fuel for vehicles or the Jetpack.

Desc_Rotor_C.name: Rotor
Desc_Rotor_C.description:
Used for crafting.
The moving parts of a motor.

Desc_Rubber_C.name: Rubber
Desc_Rubber_C.description: A very flexible material that has a lot of friction.

Desc_SAMFluctuator_C.name: SAM Fluctuator
Desc_SAMFluctuator_C.description:
The SAM Fluctuator is able to regulate and direct the behaviour of Reanimated SAM through the application of electric charges with varying frequencies.
This control facilitates technologies such as matter-to-energy conversion and spatiotemporal matter manipulation.

Desc_SAMIngot_C.name: Reanimated SAM
Desc_SAMIngot_C.description:
The active and contained form of the Strange Alien Matter.

Proper electromagnetic containment is required, as it appears to be able to manipulate the atomic bonds of any matter it comes into contact with.

Desc_SAM_C.name: SAM
Desc_SAM_C.description: Strange Alien Matter, commonly referred to as SAM, doesn't seem to follow the known laws of physics. It whispers of new possibilities.

Desc_Silica_C.name: Silica
Desc_Silica_C.description: Derived from Raw Quartz. Commonly used to create glass structures, in advanced refinement processes, and for alternative production of electronics.

Desc_SingularityCell_C.name: Singularity Cell
Desc_SingularityCell_C.description: Used to break down space and time. Required to power Portals.

Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_10_C.name: Biochemical Sculptor
Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_10_C.description:
Project Part #10. Ship via the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

Years ahead of the competition, this top-of-the-line 3D printer is used for the production of synthetic biological resources.

Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_11_C.name: Ballistic Warp Drive
Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_11_C.description:
Project Part #11. Ship via the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.
Power Usage: 1000-2000 MW (1500 MW average).

A large amount of force is required for the Warp Drives to activate, so sticking them to rockets was the logical next step. Additionally, results improved immensely when the observers were further removed from the Warp Drives upon activation.

Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_12_C.name: AI Expansion Server
Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_12_C.description:
Project Part #12. Ship via the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.
Power Usage: 1500-2500 MW (2000 MW average).

Growth is the metric by which we measure success.

Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_1_C.name: Smart Plating
Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_1_C.description: Project Part #1. Ship via the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_2_C.name: Versatile Framework
Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_2_C.description: Project Part #2. Ship via the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_3_C.name: Automated Wiring
Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_3_C.description: Project Part #3. Ship via the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_4_C.name: Modular Engine
Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_4_C.description: Project Part #4. Ship via the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_5_C.name: Adaptive Control Unit
Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_5_C.description: Project Part #5. Ship via the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_6_C.name: Magnetic Field Generator
Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_6_C.description:
Project Part #7. Ship via the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

These modular generators use superconducting magnets and vast amounts of electricity to produce a powerful and easily expandable magnetic field.

Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_7_C.name: Assembly Director System
Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_7_C.description:
Project Part #6. Ship via the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

This extremely fast and precise computing system is specifically designed to direct the Project Assembly: Assembly Phase.

Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_8_C.name: Thermal Propulsion Rocket
Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_8_C.description:
Project Part #8. Ship via the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

Uses extreme heat to produce the high-pressure plasma required to get Project Assembly into motion.

Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_9_C.name: Nuclear Pasta
Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_9_C.description:
Project Part #9. Ship via the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.
Power Usage: 500-1500 MW (1000 MW average).

Nuclear Pasta is extremely dense degenerate matter, formed when extreme pressure forces protons and electrons together into neutrons. It is theorized to exist naturally within the crust of neutron stars.

Desc_SpikedRebar_C.name: Iron Rebar
Desc_SpikedRebar_C.description: Can be shot using the Rebar Gun for self-defense purposes.

Desc_SpitterParts_C.name: Spitter Remains
Desc_SpitterParts_C.description:
The remains of a plasma-spitting alien creature.
Used for MAM research.

Desc_Stator_C.name: Stator
Desc_Stator_C.description:
Used for crafting.
The static parts of a motor.

Desc_SteelIngot_C.name: Steel Ingot
Desc_SteelIngot_C.description: Smelted from a combination of Iron Ore and Coal. Can be made into several parts used in building construction.

Desc_SteelPipe_C.name: Steel Pipe
Desc_SteelPipe_C.description: Primarily used when constructing slightly more advanced buildings.

Desc_SteelPlateReinforced_C.name: Encased Industrial Beam
Desc_SteelPlateReinforced_C.description:
Simultaneously utilizes the compressive strength of concrete and the tensile strength of steel.
Mostly used as a stable base for constructing buildings.

Desc_SteelPlate_C.name: Steel Beam
Desc_SteelPlate_C.description: Primarily used when constructing slightly more advanced buildings.

Desc_StingerParts_C.name: Stinger Remains
Desc_StingerParts_C.description:
The remains of whatever that creepy thing was.
Used for MAM research.

Desc_Stone_C.name: Limestone
Desc_Stone_C.description:
Used for crafting.
A basic resource primarily used for stable Foundations.

Desc_Sulfur_C.name: Sulfur
Desc_Sulfur_C.description: Primarily used to produce Black Powder.

Desc_SulfuricAcid_C.name: Sulfuric Acid
Desc_SulfuricAcid_C.description: Produced by combining Sulfur and Water in a complex reaction. Primarily used in refinement processes and Battery production.

Desc_TemporalProcessor_C.name: Neural-Quantum Processor
Desc_TemporalProcessor_C.description: The Neural-Quantum Processor utilizes a combination of neural network architecture and quantum computing techniques to achieve unprecedented performance. This technology has enabled some of FICSIT's biggest advancements in artificial intelligence and relativistic engineering.

Desc_TimeCrystal_C.name: Time Crystal
Desc_TimeCrystal_C.description: Time Crystals are Diamonds that have been reconfigured on a sub-atomic level in the Converter to retain a time-periodic self-organizing structure. This allows them to be used in the development of quantum processing and storage technologies.

Desc_TurboFuel_C.name: Packaged Turbofuel
Desc_TurboFuel_C.description: Turbofuel, packaged for alternative transport. Can be used as fuel for vehicles and the Jetpack.

Desc_UraniumCell_C.name: Encased Uranium Cell
Desc_UraniumCell_C.description:
Used to produce Uranium Fuel Rods for Nuclear Power production. Made from Uranium Ore.

Caution: Mildly Radioactive.

Desc_Wire_C.name: Wire
Desc_Wire_C.description:
Used for crafting.
One of the most basic parts.

Desc_Wood_C.name: Wood
Desc_Wood_C.description:
Primarily used as fuel.
Biomass Burners and vehicles can use Wood for power.

Desc_AlienPowerBuilding_C.name: Alien Power Augmenter
Desc_AlienPowerBuilding_C.description:
Generates power based on the total amount of power on the attached power grid.

This experimental technology is somehow able to extract power from the Somersloop by blasting it with energy.

Desc_AssemblerMk1_C.name: Assembler
Desc_AssemblerMk1_C.description:
Crafts 2 parts into another part.

Can be automated by feeding component parts in via Conveyor Belts connected to the input ports. The resulting parts can be automatically extracted by connecting a Conveyor Belt to the output port.

Desc_Blender_C.name: Blender
Desc_Blender_C.description:
Blends fluids together or combines them with solid parts in a wide variety of processes.
Head Lift: 10 m
(Allows fluids to be transported 10 meters upwards.)

Has both Conveyor Belt and Pipeline input and output ports.

Desc_CeilingLight_C.name: Ceiling Light
Desc_CeilingLight_C.description:
Lights up indoor factory spaces when placed on ceilings.

Light color and intensity can be adjusted via a Light Control Panel.
Allows for up to 2 Power Line connections.

Desc_ConstructorMk1_C.name: Constructor
Desc_ConstructorMk1_C.description:
Crafts 1 part into another part.

Can be automated by feeding component parts in via a Conveyor Belt connected to the input port. The resulting parts can be automatically extracted by connecting a Conveyor Belt to the output port.

Desc_Converter_C.name: Converter
Desc_Converter_C.description:
The Converter harnesses Reanimated SAM to enable precise matter and energy transmutation.

Warning: Power usage is very high and unstable.

Desc_CyberWagon_C.name: Cyber Wagon
Desc_CyberWagon_C.description:
Absolutely indestructible.
Needs no further introduction.

Desc_DroneStation_C.name: Drone Port
Desc_DroneStation_C.description:
Functions as home Port to a single Drone, which transports available input back and forth between its home Port and destination Ports.
Drone Ports can have one other Port assigned as their transport destination.

The Drone Port interface provides delivery details and allows management of Port connections.

Desc_Explorer_C.name: Explorer
Desc_Explorer_C.description:
Traverses rough terrain, including near-vertical surfaces. A fast and nimble exploration vehicle.

Has 12 inventory slots and a built-in Crafting Bench.

Fuel: Any fuel type

Desc_FloodlightPole_C.name: Flood Light Tower
Desc_FloodlightPole_C.description:
Illuminates large or outdoor spaces.

Light color and intensity can be adjusted.
Allows for up to 2 Power Line connections.

Desc_FloodlightWall_C.name: Wall-Mounted Flood Light
Desc_FloodlightWall_C.description:
Attaches to Walls and Foundations to illuminate large spaces.

Light color and intensity can be modified via a Light Control Panel.
Allows for up to 2 Power Line connections.

Desc_FoundryMk1_C.name: Foundry
Desc_FoundryMk1_C.description:
Smelts 2 resources into alloy ingots.

Can be automated by feeding ore in via Conveyor Belts connected to the input ports. The resulting ingots can be automatically extracted by connecting a Conveyor Belt to the output port.

Desc_FrackingSmasher_C.name: Resource Well Pressurizer
Desc_FrackingSmasher_C.description:
Activates a Resource Well by pressurizing the underground resource. Must be placed on a Resource Well.
Once activated, Resource Well Extractors can be placed on the surrounding sub-nodes to extract the resource.
Requires power. Overclocking increases the output potential of the entire Resource Well.

Desc_GeneratorBiomass_Automated_C.name: Biomass Burner
Desc_GeneratorBiomass_Automated_C.description:
Burns various forms of Biomass to generate electricity for the power grid.
Has a Conveyor Belt input port that allows the Biomass supply to be automated.

Resource consumption will automatically be lowered to meet power demands.

Desc_GeneratorCoal_C.name: Coal-Powered Generator
Desc_GeneratorCoal_C.description:
Burns Coal to boil Water. The steam produced rotates turbines that generate electricity for the power grid.
Has Conveyor Belt and Pipeline input ports that allow the Coal and Water supply to be automated.

Caution: Always generates power at the set clock speed. Shuts down if fuel requirements are not met.

Desc_GeneratorFuel_C.name: Fuel-Powered Generator
Desc_GeneratorFuel_C.description:
Consumes Fuel to generate electricity for the power grid.
Has a Pipeline input port that allows the Fuel supply to be automated.

Caution: Always generates power at the set clock speed. Shuts down if fuel requirements are not met.

Desc_GeneratorNuclear_C.name: Nuclear Power Plant
Desc_GeneratorNuclear_C.description:
Consumes Nuclear Fuel Rods and Water to produce electricity for the power grid.

Produces Nuclear Waste, which is extracted via the Conveyor Belt output.

Caution: Always generates power at the set clock speed. Shuts down if fuel requirements are not met.

Desc_HadronCollider_C.name: Particle Accelerator
Desc_HadronCollider_C.description:
Uses electromagnetic fields to propel particles to very high speeds and energies. The specific design allows for a variety of processes, including matter generation and conversion.

Warning: Power usage is extremely high and unstable, and varies per recipe.

Desc_JumpPadAdjustable_C.name: Jump Pad
Desc_JumpPadAdjustable_C.description:
Launches pioneers for quick, vertical traversal.
The launch angle can be adjusted while building.
Caution: Be sure to land safely!

Desc_LandingPad_C.name: U-Jelly Landing Pad
Desc_LandingPad_C.description:
Generates a speed-dampening jelly.
Guarantees a safe landing.

Desc_ManufacturerMk1_C.name: Manufacturer
Desc_ManufacturerMk1_C.description:
Crafts 3 or 4 parts into another part.

Can be automated by feeding component parts in via Conveyor Belts connected to the input ports. The resulting parts can be automatically extracted by connecting a Conveyor Belt to the output port.

Desc_MinerMk1_C.name: Miner Mk.1
Desc_MinerMk1_C.description:
Extracts solid resources from the resource node it is built on. 
Default extraction rate is 60 resources per minute. 
Extraction rate varies based on resource node purity. Outputs all extracted resources onto connected Conveyor Belts.

Desc_MinerMk2_C.name: Miner Mk.2
Desc_MinerMk2_C.description:
Extracts solid resources from the resource node it is built on. 
Default extraction rate is 120 resources per minute. 
Extraction rate varies based on resource node purity. Outputs all extracted resources onto connected Conveyor Belts.

Desc_MinerMk3_C.name: Miner Mk.3
Desc_MinerMk3_C.description:
Extracts solid resources from the resource node it is built on. 
Default extraction rate is 240 resources per minute. 
Extraction rate varies based on resource node purity. Outputs all extracted resources onto connected Conveyor Belts.

Desc_OilPump_C.name: Oil Extractor
Desc_OilPump_C.description:
Extracts Crude Oil when built on an oil node. Extraction rates vary based on node purity.

Default Extraction Rate: 120 m³ of oil per minute.
Head Lift: 10 m
(Allows fluids to be transported 10 meters upwards.)

Desc_OilRefinery_C.name: Refinery
Desc_OilRefinery_C.description:
Refines fluid and/or solid parts into other parts.
Head Lift: 10 m
(Allows fluids to be transported 10 meters upwards.)

Contains both Conveyor Belt and Pipeline input and output ports so that a wide range of recipes can be automated.

Desc_Packager_C.name: Packager
Desc_Packager_C.description:
Packages and unpackages fluids.
Head Lift: 10 m
(Allows fluids to be transported 10 meters upwards.)

Contains both Conveyor Belt and Pipeline input and output ports so that a wide range of recipes can be automated.

Desc_PipeHyperStart_C.name: Hypertube Entrance
Desc_PipeHyperStart_C.description: Powers up a Hypertube system and allows it to be entered.

Desc_PipelinePumpMk2_C.name: Pipeline Pump Mk.2
Desc_PipelinePumpMk2_C.description:
Can be attached to a Pipeline to apply Head Lift.
Maximum Head Lift: 50 m
(Allows fluids to be transported 50 meters upwards.)

NOTE: Arrows and holograms when building indicate Head Lift direction.
NOTE: Head Lift does not stack, so space between Pumps is recommended.

Desc_PipelinePump_C.name: Pipeline Pump Mk.1
Desc_PipelinePump_C.description:
Attaches to a Pipeline to apply Head Lift.
Maximum Head Lift: 20 m
(Allows fluids to be transported 20 m upwards.)

NOTE: Arrows and holograms when building indicate Head Lift direction.
NOTE: Head Lift does not stack, so space between Pumps is recommended.

Desc_PortalSatellite_C.name: Satellite Portal
Desc_PortalSatellite_C.description:
Enables pioneer teleportation between two linked Portals.

Each Portal can only have a single link. 
A link can only be made between a Main and Satellite Portal.

Singularity Cells need to be supplied to the Main Portal and will be consumed to establish and maintain the Portal link.

WARNINGS:
- Massive power draw will occur during start-up and usage.
- Power draw on use increases with travel distance.
- Link start-up will take time. Letting the connection expire is not recommended.
- Failure to deliver sufficient Singularity Cells will cause the link to expire.
- FICSIT does not condone the use of wormhole technology. Any usage of wormhole technology is at the user's own risk.

Desc_Portal_C.name: Main Portal
Desc_Portal_C.description:
Enables pioneer teleportation between two linked Portals.

Each Portal can only have a single link. 
A link can only be made between a Main and Satellite Portal.

Singularity Cells need to be supplied to the Main Portal and will be consumed to establish and maintain the Portal link.

WARNINGS:
- Massive power draw will occur during start-up and usage.
- Power draw on use increases with travel distance.
- Link start-up will take time. Letting the connection expire is not recommended.
- Failure to deliver sufficient Singularity Cells will cause the link to expire.
- FICSIT does not condone the use of wormhole technology. Any usage of wormhole technology is at the user's own risk.

Desc_QuantumEncoder_C.name: Quantum Encoder
Desc_QuantumEncoder_C.description:
The Quantum Encoder uses Excited Photonic Matter to produce the most complex of parts, controlling development up to the quantum level.

Warning: Power usage is extremely high and unstable.

Desc_RadarTower_C.name: Radar Tower
Desc_RadarTower_C.description:
Scans the surrounding area to display additional information on the Map.

Information revealed on the Map includes:
- Resource node locations
- Terrain data
- Flora & fauna information
- Notable signal readings

Desc_ResourceSink_C.name: AWESOME Sink
Desc_ResourceSink_C.description:
Got excess resources? Fear not, for FICSIT does not waste! The newly developed AWESOME Sink turns any and all useful parts into research data just as fast as you can supply them! 
Participating pioneers will be compensated with Coupons that can be spent at the AWESOME Shop.

Desc_SmelterMk1_C.name: Smelter
Desc_SmelterMk1_C.description:
Smelts ore into ingots.

Can be automated by feeding ore in via a Conveyor Belt connected to the input port. The resulting ingots can be automatically extracted by connecting a Conveyor Belt to the output port.

Desc_StreetLight_C.name: Street Light
Desc_StreetLight_C.description:
Lights up factory areas and roads.

Light color and intensity can be adjusted.
Allows for up to 2 Power Line connections.

Desc_Tractor_C.name: Tractor
Desc_Tractor_C.description:
Picks up and delivers resources at Truck Stations. This process can be automated. Nicknamed 'Sugarcube' by FICSIT pioneers with the justification “It’s pretty sweet, y’know”.

Has 25 inventory slots and a built-in Crafting Bench.

Fuel: Any fuel type

Desc_TrainDockingStationLiquid_C.name: Fluid Freight Platform
Desc_TrainDockingStationLiquid_C.description:
Loads and unloads Freight Cars that stop at the Freight Platform.
Loading and unloading options can be set by configuring the building.
Snaps to other Platforms and Stations.
Needs to be connected to a powered Railway to function.

Desc_TrainDockingStation_C.name: Freight Platform
Desc_TrainDockingStation_C.description:
Loads and unloads Freight Cars that stop at the Freight Platform.
Loading and unloading options can be set by configuring the building.
Snaps to other Platforms and Stations.
Needs to be connected to a powered Railway to function.

Desc_TrainStation_C.name: Train Station
Desc_TrainStation_C.description:
Serves as a hub for Locomotives, which can be set to navigate to and stop at a Train Station.
You can connect power to a Train Station to power up the trains on the Railway as well as feed power to other stations.

Desc_TruckStation_C.name: Truck Station
Desc_TruckStation_C.description:
Sends or receives resources to/from vehicles.

Has 48 inventory slots.

Transfers up to 120 stacks per minute to/from docked vehicles. 
Always refuels vehicles if it has access to a matching fuel type.

Desc_Truck_C.name: Truck
Desc_Truck_C.description:
Picks up and delivers resources at Truck Stations. This process can be automated. Nicknamed 'The Unit' by FICSIT pioneers because of its massive frame.

Has 48 inventory slots and a built-in Crafting Bench.

Fuel: Any fuel type

Desc_WaterPump_C.name: Water Extractor
Desc_WaterPump_C.description:
Extracts water from the body of water it is built on.
Note: the water needs to be sufficiently deep, and rivers are generally not deep enough.

Default Extraction Rate: 120 m³ of water per minute.
Head Lift: 10 m
(Allows fluids to be transported 10 meters upwards.)
